name: dockstatapi
description: DockStatAPI is an API backend featuring plugins and more for DockStat

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production LOG_LEVEL=info bun run src/index.ts
scripts.start:docker: bun run build:docker && docker run -p 3000:3000 --rm -d --name dockstatapi -v 'plugins:/DockStatAPI/src/plugins' dockstatapi:local
scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev bun run --watch src/index.ts
scripts.dev:clean:
bun dev ; echo '
Exiting...' ; bun clean
scripts.clean: bun run clean:win || bun run clean:lin
scripts.clean:win: node -e "process.exit(process.platform === 'win32' ? 0 : 1)" && cmd /c del /Q data/dockstatapi* && cmd /c del /Q stacks/* && cmd /c del /Q reports/markdown/*.md && echo 'success'
scripts.clean:lin: node -e "process.exit(process.platform !== 'win32' ? 0 : 1)" && rm -f data/dockstatapi* && sudo rm -rf stacks/* && rm -f reports/markdown/*.md && echo 'success'
